revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Weather Institute |image = [[File:Weather Institute.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Weather Institute. |tokens = 26,000 |location = Route 119 }} '''Weather Institute''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Hoenn]]. It initially has 49 tiles arranged in a 7x7 square, including 7 chest tiles, 17 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 470,000 HP.
== Tables des rencontres == === Rencontres sauvages ===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=5|
N/A || [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena |- | [[File:Team_Aqua_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Aqua Grunt || [[File:Poochyena.png|40px]] Poochyena, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Castform.png|40px]] '''Castform''' ||
'''1,820,000''' || [[File:Aqua_Admin_(shelly).png|40px]] Aqua Admin Shelly || [[File:Carvanha.png|40px]] Carvanha, [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena ||
910,000 |- |}
*Must have cleared Weather Institute at least once to unlock Castform
==Objets== ===Sans Perte de Bonus===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Damp Rock}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Smooth Rock}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Heat Rock}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | {{Bag2|Icy Rock}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.30% || 2.53% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.59% || 4.03% |}
===Table du taux d'obtention avec Perte de bonus===
After Reaching Kalos, the drop chance for items in Hoenn will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable collapsible collapsed" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Egg}} || N/A || 37.50% || 37.50% || 37.50% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Damp Rock}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Smooth Rock}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Heat Rock}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | {{Bag2|Icy Rock}} || N/A || 0.23% || 0.23% || 0.23% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Splash Plate}} || N/A || 0.10% || 0.10% || 0.10% |}
